Question: MSL inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
HPE (Hewlett Packard Enterprise)

MSL2024 Tape Library

 - Base configuration options
 - Variety of tape drives
 - Software license offerings
 - Encryption options/licenses
 - Regional power cords
 - Redundant power supply upgrade kit
 - Magazine kits
 - HBAs (Host Bus Adapters) and SAS Controllers
 - Media and optical cables
 - SAS cable kits
 - HPE Support services

MSL3040 Tape Library

 - Supports up to 15 expansion modules
 - Maximum form factor of 48U
 - Compressed total capacity of up to 28.8 PB
 - Library investment protection
 - Tool-free drive upgrades
 - Scalable with MSL6480 for additional enterprise features
Summary_cn:
惠普企业（Hewlett Packard Enterprise）

MSL2024磁带库

- 基础配置选项
- 各种磁带驱动器
- 软件授权方案
- 加密选项/许可证
- 区域电源线
- 冗余电源升级套件
- 杂志套件
- 主机总线适配器（HBAs）和SAS控制器
- 媒体和光纤电缆
- SAS电缆套件
- HPE支持服务

MSL3040磁带库

- 支持最多15个扩展模块
- 最大尺寸48U
- 压缩总容量高达28.8 PB
- 图书馆投资保护
- 无需工具升级驱动器
- 与MSL6480可扩展以获得更多企业功能
